text: The 2022–23 season is scheduled to be the 124th in the history of FC Bayern Munich and their 58th consecutive season in the top flight. The club will participate in Bundesliga, DFB-Pokal, DFL-Supercup and UEFA Champions League. ==Players== ===Squad=== ==Transfers== ===In=== Player Transferred from Fee Date Source – Juventus U16 – Türkgücü München Antonio Tikvic verstärkt FC Bayern Amateure FC Bayern.
